TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ECDsa extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class ECDsa Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 提供用于封装椭圆曲线数字签名算法 (ECDSA) 的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that encapsulates the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用作的抽象基类派生。This class serves as the abstract base class for derivations.

protected: ECDsa();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从派生类调用此构造函数类。This constructor is called by classes that derive from the class. 类是当前支持的唯一实现[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。The class is the only implementation currently supported by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 你可以提供您自己的自定义实现。You may provide your own custom implementation.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线数字签名算法 (ECDSA) 的实现的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of an implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

param.span: ECDSA 实现的名称。

span.span: The name of an ECDSA implementation.

param.span: 以下字符串指的是同一个实现，它是当前 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中支持的唯一实现。

span.span: The following strings all refer to the same implementation, which is the only implementation currently supported in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]:

param.span: \-“ECDsa”

span.span: \- "ECDsa"

param.span: \-“ECDsaCng”

span.span: \- "ECDsaCng"

param.span: \-“System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng”

span.span: \- "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng"

param.span: 也可以提供自定义 ECDSA 实现的名称。

span.span: You can also provide the name of a custom ECDSA implementation.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线数字签名算法 (ECDSA) 的指定实现的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

returns.span: 此类的指定实现的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the specified implementation of this class.

returns.span: 如果指定的算法名称没有映射到 ECDSA 实现，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If the specified algorithm name does not map to an ECDSA implementation, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您开发自己的实现对象，可以使用方法重载来创建自定义`algorithm`字符串，指定您的实现。If you develop your own implementation of an object, you can use the method overload to create a custom `algorithm` string that specifies your implementation. 如果指定的自定义值`algorithm`参数，对象将使用它来确定是否可以创建一个 ECDSA 对象。If you specify a custom value for the `algorithm` parameter, the object will use it to determine whether an ECDSA object can be created.

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 获取密钥交换算法的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性继承自基类。This property is inherited from the base class. 椭圆曲线数字签名算法 (ECDSA) 用于数字签名生成;它不用于密钥派生因此，此属性返回`null`。The Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) is used for digital signature generation; it is not used for key derivation Therefore, this property returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该签名是通过使用公钥进行解密，然后与验证的哈希值进行比较。The signature is first decrypted by using the public key, and then compared to the hash value for verification.
